alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FREEZING FOG UNTIL 9 AM MST TODAY... * WHAT...Localized visibility one mile or less in freezing fog with near zero visibility at times near the Pocatello Airport along Interstate 86. * WHERE...Lower Snake Plain, Eastern Magic Valley, Marsh/Arbon Highlands, and Blackfoot Mountains including but not limited to Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, Fort Hall, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, and Bone. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions at times due to low visibility and potential ice accumulation on roadway surfaces. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If driving and you encounter fog, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Blackfoot Mountains; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
